metadata.title: Family Business - Button & Non-woven Manufacturing
metadata.description: Professional button sewing and non-woven fabric manufacturing. Ati Weaving Factory provides high-quality garment accessories solutions.

hero.title: Craftsmanship · Quality First
hero.subtitle: Over 20 years of expertise in button sewing and non-woven manufacturing
hero.description: We are a family business with a button sewing workshop and Ati Weaving Factory, providing high-quality garment accessories solutions.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Two core businesses to meet your different needs

button.title: Button Sewing
button.description: Professional button sewing services for all types of garments with exquisite craftsmanship

nonWoven.title: Non-woven Manufacturing
nonWoven.description: Ati Weaving Factory specializes in non-woven products and various types of webbing

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Family Business, Craftsmanship Heritage
about.description: We are a family business with over 20 years of history, growing from a small workshop to a comprehensive garment accessories supplier with button sewing and non-woven manufacturing.

story1.title: Button Sewing Workshop
story1.content: Our button sewing workshop has rich experience and exquisite craftsmanship, providing quality button sewing services for many garment brands. From manual to mechanized, we always adhere to the principle of quality first.

story2.title: Ati Weaving Factory
story2.content: Ati Weaving Factory focuses on the production of non-woven products and various types of webbing, with advanced production equipment and a professional technical team, providing customers with stable and reliable product supply.

quality.title: Quality Assurance
quality.description: Strict quality control system ensures every product meets standards

delivery.title: Fast Delivery
delivery.description: Efficient production process delivers your orders on time

custom.title: Custom Service
custom.description: Personalized custom solutions according to customer needs

price.title: Price Advantage
price.description: Factory direct sales provide you with the most competitive prices

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Looking forward to working with you
